categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Tan Yuster was a male Human Padawan serving the Jedi Order and the Galactic Republic in the decade marked by the Separatist Crisis.

A Force-sensitive Human, Tan Yuster was educated in the ways of the Force by the Jedi Order during the decade marked by the Separatist Crisis. Selected as a Padawan by Jedi Master Agen Kolar, Tan constructed a green-bladed lightsaber which he wielded in battle. When the Clone Wars erupted between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems, Yuster accompanied his master to the planet Geonosis where he fought as part of a massive strike team to liberate Jedi Obi-Wan Kenobi, Anakin Skywalker, and Senator Padmé Amidala from the Confederacy leaders. He did not survive the battle and during a lull in the fighting as the survivors regrouped at the arena's center gathering in a defensive circular formation Agen knelt down over his fallen Padawan to silently pay his respects.
Tan Yuster was portrayed by Kalki Rose, a student of Byron Bay Kendo Club.
